Detailed Description

Online backup settings.

Field Documentation

◆ file_mode

db_backup_t::file_mode

Options for creating destination file.

Any bitwise combination of:

  • DB_UTF8_NAME: File name encoded in UTF8.

◆ backup_flags

db_backup_t::backup_flags

Reserved for future use.

Set to 0.

◆ crypt

db_backup_t::crypt

Encryption callbacks for user cipher.

To enable encryption with a custom cipher, set the cipher_type to DB_CIPHER_USER and implement the encrypt and decrypt functions. An encrypted database must always be opened with the same encryption algorithm that was used when it was created.

◆ cipher_type

db_backup_t::cipher_type

Cipher for encrypted storage.

One of:

  • DB_CIPHER_NONE
  • DB_CIPHER_USER
  • DB_CIPHER_AES128_CTR
  • DB_CIPHER_AES256_CTR

◆ cipher_data

db_backup_t::cipher_data

Symmetric encryption key or user cipher data.

◆ cipher_data_size

db_backup_t::cipher_data_size

Size of cipher_data.

For best results, use 128 with DB_CIPHER_AES128_CTR and 256 with DB_CIPHER_AES256_CTR.
